showScoreExcerpt:
“While ’A Beautiful Noise’ isn’t quite as weak as some have made it out to be, when compared to other recent shows with similar ambitions...this remains an undistinguished contribution...A Beautiful Noise contributes little to the stature of the Broadway musical theatre.”
